meanings.definition: Not producing or secreting a substance
meanings.sent1: The nonsecretory gland did not release any fluids.
meanings.sent2: The nonsecretory cells in the body do not create any liquids.
meanings.sent3: The nonsecretory plant refused to give away its nectar.
meanings.sent4: Her nonsecretory behavior kept her thoughts hidden from others.
meanings.sent5: The nonsecretory rock absorbed all the water without leaking any out.

meanings.definition: Not involving or relating to secretion
meanings.sent1: The nonsecretory process did not require any fluid release.
meanings.sent2: The nonsecretory task was completed without any secretion involved.
meanings.sent3: The nonsecretory meeting focused solely on information sharing.
meanings.sent4: His nonsecretory approach to problem-solving was refreshing.
meanings.sent5: The nonsecretory event was dry and lacked any hidden surprises.
